body.header: IELTS Writing Task 2You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. You should write at least 250 words.

section.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topic.

p.b: One of the reasons why hunger and poverty still exist in many parts of the developing world is the continuing use of outdated, subsistence farming methods. These countries should change over to modern, large-scale farming of cash crops for the export market.

section.p: To what extent do you agree or disagree?
